name: PostDelete
description: Delete time series data from InfluxDB

org.description: Specifies the organization to delete data from.

bucket.description: Specifies the bucket to delete data from.

orgID.description: Specifies the organization ID of the resource.

bucketID.description: Specifies the bucket ID to delete data from.

$ul: **code**: code is the machine-readable error code.
**err**: err is a stack of errors that occurred during processing of the request. Useful for debugging.
**op**: op describes the logical code operation during error. Useful for debugging.
